basic.description:
Ensemble experience for qualified flutists. Course includes weekly rehearsals and a minimum of one concert per term for all students.  Credit attained only with regular attendance, active participation, and ample preparation.
NOTE    Placement is made at the discretion of the School of Music, after audition.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Flute Choir

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    Registration in a BMUS Program, or permission of the School of Music, upon audition.
